snippet: Hundreds of people, some from as far away as Tokyo, came to the Prairie Festival in Salina, Kan., to sleep under the stars and hear lectures on subjects like sustainable agriculture.
abstract: Salina Journal; annual Prairie Festival in Salina, Kan, attracts hundreds of people to hear lectures on subjects like sustainable agriculture and energy sources; art and music also play a role.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of people, some from as far away as Tokyo, came to the Prairie Festival in Salina, Kan., to sleep under the stars and hear lectures on subjects like sustainable agriculture.

headline.seo: Prairie Festival Draws Crowds to Land Institute in Kansas
headline.main: Out on the Prairie, Moon, Music and Lectures, Too
headline.print_headline: Out on the Prairie, Moon, Music and Lectures, Too
